snippet: The work of the artist Agnes Denes, in all its variety, is being introduced to new audiences in shows on both coasts.
abstract: Work of artist Agnes Denes, survivor of Nazi occupation of Hungary who brings intense personal perspective to her art, is being introduced to new audiences with shows at gallery in Chelsea and Santa Monica Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: The work of the artist Agnes Denes, in all its variety, is being introduced to new audiences in shows on both coasts.

headline.seo: Agnes Denes Stretches the Canvas as Far as Can Go
headline.main: Stretching Her Creativity as Far as Possible
headline.print_headline: Stretching Her Creativity As Far as Possible
